quotes.text: The dead exist in the past, and I must tend to the future.
quotes.author: Lord Shen

quotes.text: Worrying doesn't make the broth boil any faster.
quotes.author: Mr. Ping

quotes.text: You aren't completely useless after all.
quotes.author: Tai Lung

quotes.text: But I like who I am!
quotes.author: Po

quotes.text: You gotta let go of the past.
quotes.author: Po

quotes.text: Quit, don't quit. Noodles, don't noodles.
quotes.author: Master Oogway

quotes.text: Who are you? ... I've been asking the same question. Am I the son of a panda? The son of a goose? A student? A teacher? Turns out, I'm all of them.
quotes.author: Po

quotes.text: Happiness must be taken, and I will take mine.
quotes.author: Lord Shen

quotes.text: One often meets his destiny on the road he takes to avoid it.
quotes.author: Master Oogway
